Reviews.Title: “Clean and very good value”
Reviews.Author: richy280983
Reviews.Content: stayed partner 4 nights november paid night hotel 10 minute walk platz ubahn central berlin takes 15 minutes 128 bus tofrom tegel airport shops restaurants overlooked city centre breakfast paid costs 10 euro person bothered cant comment decent size fairly modern clean luxury look elsewhere value base sightseeing definately recommend hotel preferred stay city centre price impossible hostel low quality hotel staff dealt friendly english aircraft noise barely audible windows closed stayed facing final approach berlin tegel

Reviews.Title: “As expected”
Reviews.Author: lonestar1988
Reviews.Content: pictures price unexpected pleased nicely modern interior hotels weve location wasnt amazing distance kurt ubahn okay nice restaurants course market pretty street time breakfast included 10 euro breakfast person little tried street breakfast 2 nice course cheaper clean staff attentive complying course hotel situated close tegel airport means planes crossing time didnt bother windows closed hardly hear hotels weve visited

Reviews.Title: “Good price for me”
Reviews.Author: rob_sad
Reviews.Content: hotel doesnt location guests explore city close airport probably cheapest hotel public transportation airport option taxi luckily short slept night departure morning modest

Reviews.Title: “Clean, basic hotel close to Tegel airport”
Reviews.Author: DP2K
Reviews.Content: stayed night short trip berlin hotel clean newly decorated convenient tegel airport staff helpful pleasant stay ac warm time unfamiliar tegel decided stay close airport morning flight isnt value berlin

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great price.”
Reviews.Author: Hekator
Reviews.Content: service nice polite nicely decorated clean bed location near metro station quickly city center air conditioning weather €45 double night wo breakfast price

Reviews.Title: “Warm, Friendly and Welcoming - absolute bargain”
Reviews.Author: matty-os
Reviews.Content: £30 night wasnt expecting ritz carlton hotel clean basic fresh decor roof bathrooms clean shower hotel 5 min walk kurt u6 line 10 mins main airport 10 mins bus ride heard people complain size location foolish surely cant expect spacious central price offered sized average staff friendly spoke superb english fault hotel suggest etc

HotelInfo.Name: Grand City Central Hotel Berlin Airport
HotelInfo.Address: Kogelstrasse 12-13, 13403 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Central-Hotel Reinickendorf)
